Name: Black Sheep
WorldDescription: If we only see ourselves through the lens of our mistakes, we may naturally label ourselves as "black sheep."" However, no one is eternally trapped in the past. A fired bullet will be set on a new target, and even the ""weapon" will regain its true colors.

Name: Sharks-buster
WorldDescription: Once a super popular product released by Venus Splash Park in the Golden Age, it has now been modified into a highly waterproof weapon that still consists of 12 convenient everyday tools, including nail clippers and files. The coating has been preserved at someone's suggestion, but it would be very naive to underestimate its firepower because of its adorable appearance.

Name: Benizakura
WorldDescription: A katana used by the Performer Puppets to perform an ethereal blade dance.

Name: Lupercalia
WorldDescription: Brings the power of the faun's blade to life using modern technology. Inside this chocolate box is the name of your destined one. The ancient reign is long gone, but this bizarre tradition still exists. Come, find your fate in this box. You have unlimited time.

Name: 影打—残光
WorldDescription: 眼前の刃は夕日が如く赤い光を放つ。ただの残材であったが特殊な加工を施して現在のような変化を起こした。刀の性能自体が変わった訳ではないものの、より鋭い刃へ変貌したことを無意識にうかがわせる。「色」というのは、そんな奇妙で素晴らしい効果を持っている。

Name: Bonescale Blade
WorldDescription: Do you really think mermaids have no means to protect themselves? They forge their scales into a mail and bones into a blade to defend their bodies, minds, and their important ones behind.

Name: Red Sky Ritual
WorldDescription: Exchanging eternal vows in the twilight elegy, the outcast demon forged a sharp blade of contract with blood. She will forever be with you without any cost.

Name: Caldwell - 49
WorldDescription: This Levi-Gun was named after a rose in a far-off galaxy. The universe was dubbed the "ultimate romance" during the Golden Age. Of course, converting the romantic value into damage is far more gratifying. Whether it's the aesthetic or the damage rate, it's nearly flawless, except that it demands the user to have a superb aiming skill.

Name: Platinum Swan
WorldDescription: Just like how people tend to ignore the aggressiveness of swans for their gorgeous looks, the elegant and slender shape of this Levi-Gun often makes others forget the fact that it is a weapon used by Task Force Constructs.

Name: Light Silk
WorldDescription: The spring breeze blows the leaves, at the other end of the hackberry woods, a beautiful lady is waiting for you.

Name: Iris
WorldDescription: Beautiful things come with thorns, the same as this bow.

Name: White Acclaim
WorldDescription: As the name suggests, this is a ceremonial rather than a practical weapon. Instead of a raging battlefield, it belongs in a sacred or peaceful setting.

Name: Nightflyer
WorldDescription: A bow that follows the style of a traditional hunting bow both in terms of design and crafting techniques. Its black gold body and faintly glowing red dots on it can always make one think of a hunter in an ambush. Preys will always fall at the sound of the bowstring.

Name: Elpis, Release!
WorldDescription: Carrying the purest dream of the girl, the pink bow spreads its wings to shoot the arrow infused with passion and hope to the darkness before dawn. When the dawn breaks, the girl travels in the sound of discussion and sees the familiar figure. She secretly pulls the pink bowstring that not only contains the power to destroy evil but also Cupid's magic.

Name: Somber Arc
WorldDescription: There's always a falcon who watches over every corner of evil through the rainy nights and neon lights. Don't be afraid, for the long night will always be illuminated by the light of justice.

Name: Eternal Nightfall: Dreamless Ode
WorldDescription: Even as night swallows the dusk, stardust pierces the veil, turning dreams and wishes into star arrows, guarding the laughter and songs in this imperfect world.

Name: Summer Rain-Bow
WorldDescription: Sunlight dances on rippling water, reflecting a mirage of midsummer with the twang of strings. Colors bleed into one another, swaying with the coconut trees. Far on the horizon, rainbow arcs flicker like distant phantoms.

Name: Shark Fang
WorldDescription: Aloha! Shark incoming! What do you mean that's not how sharks sound? Don't nitpick the details, c'mon! —NA-NA-MI, having gone full shark mode

Name: Giggling Pumpkin
WorldDescription: What would the world be like if there were no laughter for a festive celebration? Give me a pumpkin... Like this... and this... See, how big is its smile!

Name: Danza Macabra
WorldDescription: A high-chromium alloy greatsword themed after the festival of the dead. Robust, simple, and rough in design. Fit for a robust, simple, and rough user.

Name: Star of Bethlehem
WorldDescription: A greatsword that resembles a Christmas tree. The Star of Bethlehem is stuck tightly on the tip, so tight that not even a fierce swing can shake it off. The blade is not sharp, but its bulk makes it a deadly weapon.

Name: Oceanic Assault
WorldDescription: A sword that uses a massive amount of soft filling material to cope with impact beyond the limit. Its unique design also makes it look more like a cushion than a weapon. Although the cold light reflected by the blade (the fin) makes most people drop the idea of holding it while sleeping, the fish's eyes are surprisingly mesmerizing. Even the designer ended up falling victim to it.

Name: Shadow Blade
WorldDescription: A greatsword featuring a low-key dark color scheme to highlight the durability of its material. However, its user commented, "The color is too dull. It needs something vibrant." Therefore, a red ribbon was added to the sword. Besides, the ribbon is surprisingly suitable for the festival that we are celebrating.

Name: Firecrackers
WorldDescription: Its design is inspired by firecrackers. The firecrackers on the tail can be loaded into the barrel as a projectile. It has a several second downtime after every shot.

Name: Palm Snow
WorldDescription: Snowflakes melt in the palm of your hands, and passion raises the temperature between your fingers. Together, you will no longer be afraid of the cold winter.

Name: Flame Beast
WorldDescription: Although the user always complains that the designer misunderstood their requirements and that they want a feline beast who devours food, not a cute beast who holds a knife and fork, the user has never raised the appeal or asked for adjustment.

Name: Summer Waves
WorldDescription: Come! Let's set the sea on fire! Who says you have to use a water gun in a water fight? Water cannons are the best!

Name: World Drifter
WorldDescription: Not joyous for external gains, not saddened for personal losses. Even if the world crumbles, be the stream to weave through the ruins. Just like these twin daggers, undeterred by the world's change. They carry the legacy of Kowloong, enduring until the day they're needed once more.

Name: Budding Wish
WorldDescription: In the quiet, unknown depths, scattered sparks have lighted up the dust. The dawn is coming. How would the closed buds blossom when it arrives?

Name: Dragonboat
WorldDescription: A greatsword created with the theme of an ancient Dragon Boat Festival celebration ceremony. A tester complains that a sword with this design can only be an exhibit and then raises the sword, which immediately breaks the wall of the testing room.

Name: Yggdrasil
WorldDescription: As the hero protects this world, the sacred world tree comes to its guardian's aid. Taking a branch from Yggdrasil, the hero turns it into the eternal divine spear—a deadly weapon, as well as a living part of Yggdrasil.

Name: Crimson Banner
WorldDescription: The knight rides on her track at dawn. She will share her victory with you. Let the glory of triumph burn on the flag high above the podium.

Name: Glistening Oath
WorldDescription: A resounding sound cuts through the snow, echoing across the sky as the timeless legend of the hero pierces through the air. Amidst the world's praises, she sets her sights on her ultimate destination. Her dignified bearing and radiant brilliance speak volumes of an unwavering resolve to fulfill her vow.

Name: Starry Clouds
WorldDescription: The stars have been witnessing mankind for an eternity. The human history is like ever-changing clouds. The patterns on the heavy glaive are delicate and give an antique feel. According to the Kowloong history, this glaive was once given to its owner as a gift. There is a small "Yuan" signed at the end of the letter found in the package.

Name: Birth at Silent Night
WorldDescription: A loyal white dog builds the path between life and death. An elegant black cat chases away the evil serpent. She wields the scepter in her hand and prays for all her people to have hope in life.

Name: Cosmic Gamble
WorldDescription: The song of Metropolis still echoes in the vast world. We follow our hearts and leave the rest to God. Though put away for a long time, the gauntlets' golden inscriptions still shine bright. Whoever wears them will crack the hardest as their creator has wished.

Name: Thorn Aria
WorldDescription: A powerful amplifier with an eye-catching appearance. When wielded, it creates the illusion of falling stars while amplifying undeniably awe-inspiring damage.

Name: Open Annulus
WorldDescription: The internal transmission loop of Open Annulus is complex and esoteric because of its avant-garde notch design. Once considered to prioritize form over function, its immense computing power has silenced its naysayers as its processing power reaches new heights from its breakthrough innovation.

Name: Lunar Clouds
WorldDescription: I stand against the railing in the wind under the moon, mourning over my hometown which has long been destroyed.

Name: Dawn's Judgment
WorldDescription: The forgotten goddess has retrieved her lost power and will walk to the dawn with her own will.

Name: Soaker Mk.81 Redux
WorldDescription: Soaker Mk.81 was originally just a toy sold by a certain 13th consortium during the Golden Age. It is surprising that it can really be used as a weapon after Wanshi's thorough modification. Equipped with Wanshi's customized energy can filled with mint-flavored gas, it can refresh the minds of its user and the target hit when it fires. It also retains a function that a toy should have. By reducing its power output, its user can blow away sleepiness with pleasantly cool winds.

Name: Moonlight Fantasia
Description: Yesterday Once More — Uniframe Cello Blade
WorldDescription: Away from the familiar roads and into the mysterious night. Close your eyes and let the silent music of the night flow, soft and bright. This may not be the home you yearn for, nor the end of your journey. Even so, rest my little traveler, just for a while and lose yourself in this symphony of lights.

Name: Starry Capriccio
WorldDescription: Wandering in the field, gazing at the infinite universe, opening your arms, listening to the songs of the wind... Traveler, let go of everything for a moment and let your spirit freely roam on this starry night so you can enjoy this joyous capriccio.

Name: Lion Glory
WorldDescription: Lion Glory is the name of the weapon equipped by outstanding F.O.S. graduates. Its name originates from the lion-like deep roar when it is swung. Lions are not easily tamed, and Lion's Glory is not lightly given out. Holders need to discipline themselves and engrave their hopes on their chests to be worthy of the glory of the lion's soul.

Name: Gray Moon Embrace
WorldDescription: A weapon that cuts through the red tide as if desiring to drink all the blood of its enemies. As long as its hilt is gripped tightly, its wielder will have an endless impulse to keep moving forward no matter what has happened. But is this an eternal curse or a voluntary choice of its wielder?

Name: Leisure Time
WorldDescription: The new version modified based on Kara Type I. It's lighter, more flexible, and easy to hide. Obviously, he is prepared to protect the other person in any situation.

Name: Blue Slumber
Description: Yesterday Once More — Uniframe Chain Blade
WorldDescription: A dreamy blue rose blooms in the palm of the knight's hand. There he stands, on the shore far across the distance, praying for the dream world to extend and the pedals to crush the confusion and lead a way for an encounter. Even if the connection is bound to be made with thorns, and despite the suffering and the pain, he will never let it go until death.

Name: Shining Banner
WorldDescription: A flag embodies willpower and ideals. Its design is simple, but the spirit of solidarity it carries can truly reach the hearts of anyone. It will shine forever as long as there are people willing to unite and keep fighting for the victory of humanity!

Name: Theros' Bloom
WorldDescription: In order to protect the maiden from the scorching light, its panels open as if a flower blooms, occupying a space exclusively for her. Maintaining a low profile, the maiden looks for something that can arouse her interest along with the flow of music, until a person meets her gaze and instantly turns away. The maiden knows it is time to use its another function. She folds the panels down and hurls it like a javelin. It pierces into the ground right before the commandant.

Name: Ankh
WorldDescription: The dead move on, while the survivors retreat. Only the warriors refuse to yield to the abyss but embrace the new birth of oblivion, fighting under the starry sky and wandering at the borders of the underworld. Hopefully, when the sky is burned out, the elegy of the underworld can guide their lost souls on their way back home.

Name: Spear Champion
WorldDescription: In ancient times, this banner was a symbol of hope. No matter how intense the war is, as long as the banner is still standing, there is still a chance to turn things around. Now the banner has been raised again, delivering the same message: There is always a silver lining even in the most desperate situation.

Name: Firmament
WorldDescription: In the vast cold sky, this is the only thing that never leaves the deity's side. What is she waiting and wishing for? It seems that only the ones who can reach her will know the truth.

Name: Spring's Rising
WorldDescription: Set off the firecrackers to chase away the evil and welcome the spring. In the light of the firecrackers, people wish one other a happy, prosperous new year.

Name: Titania
WorldDescription: Butterfly wings carry dreams and give off a jade-colored luminescence. As long as the traces of memory do not fade, the light of the scepter will not grow dim, and the magic of realizing dreams will last forever.

Name: Wind Wisher
WorldDescription: As she prays, she imparts her wishes to the gods. Quietly seated in the courtyard, the girl softly plays her flute. May boundless happiness forever accompany the one she yearns for, distant and beyond her grasp. The melody of the flute intertwines with rustling leaves, and her gaze pierces through swirling snow into the mist. "Can I see you once more, even if only for a moment...?"

Name: Echoing Ripples
WorldDescription: This innovative attempt aims to push the boundaries of traditional instruments, merging the realms of classical and pop music to create a fresh experience. Under the request of Ayla, Leonie has successfully crafted Modulation III, a component that seamlessly blends these two musical genres. "Could this actually lead to something like incorporating suona into hard rock music in the future?" —Leonie

Name: Red Blossom
WorldDescription: The girl on the stage nervously holds her hands before her chest, while the audience eagerly anticipates hearing her singing. She makes up her mind and draws an arc with two fingers. Just when the audience is about to imitate her gesture, a red, sharp blade appears and starts dancing in sync with the girl. After a short silence, the audience bursts into cheers—Being good at singing is not the only standard for the new generation of idols.

Name: Rabbit Fire
WorldDescription: The first weapon released this year by the Engineering Force. With support from a vice captain, it found its way to the World Government Association of Art for a fresh coat of paint. Now, it sports a rabbit motif, because, well, "a weapon should reflect its master." Swing it down hard, and the whoosh of air is like the booming thunder of spring. Who would have thought that it was merely a mechanical mortar for pounding rice cakes before it was modified by Karenina?

Name: Glamorous Star
WorldDescription: WGAA's latest creation! Paying homage to the Golden Age idols, it features more vibrant colors, with a music module incorporated. Every swing seems to weave a spell of allure, imbuing its wielder with a radiant glow. "Well, since Commandant as the 'producer' has said so, I'll try my best to sing. It's not... not because I enjoy it or anything!"

Name: Thunder Talisman
WorldDescription: Forged from an ancient text, it holds a sinister power, sealed away by potent charms. As it swings, the hammer obeys the incantation, its mystic eyes darting, perceiving the forces of the universe. With earth-shattering force, it shatters souls and banishes all evil.

Name: Paper Song
WorldDescription: In his childhood, he always imagined the origami in his hands transforming into formidable weapons, granting him the strength to resist and defend. As he matured, his longing became a wish for all weapons in the world to turn back into delicate paper, so that all violent conflicts would end in playful endeavors. Today, the white that can be easily stained by blood on this weapon serves as a silent reminder to its bearer, urging him never to forget the profound weight of life.

Name: Southern Cross
WorldDescription: As the daylight fades, the stars of the cross appear in the night sky, leading those who have been lost back to the right path.

Name: Snow Oath
WorldDescription: Two souls exchange vows amidst the relentless snow, their wounds overlapped. A testament to bonds forged and promises kept.

Name: Awakened Dusk
WorldDescription: The undying light and the fiery clouds will tear open every night. She also believes that the dawn will arrive every time when the past is remembered.

Name: Swan Feather
WorldDescription: Despite how her stage is gone, the seats are empty, and her pirouettes are accompanied by heartbreaks and deaths, the little swan in her dream is still dancing, blessing those important figures who watch over her.

Name: Dancing Delight
WorldDescription: She gently leaps, her blades shattering the not-so-gentle good night, their elegance remains undisturbed.

Name: Balletic Innocence
WorldDescription: Deep in the dream, the dance has reached its climax in the bright light. Little audiences of the fairytale kingdom circle around the campfire and wind up the music box, looking forward to the next dance.

Name: Woe's Wonder
WorldDescription: Though covered in the dark blood of the past, the hunter still holds the weapon in his hand tight. No one needs to know what he sacrificed. He steps on the path of bodies and will bring the silver lining as promised at the end of the night.

Name: Water Leisure
WorldDescription: This particular arsenal set is undeniably designed for beach warfare, equipped to handle any form of assault with strategic countermeasures. However, the highlight undoubtedly lies in the inclusion of a remarkable water cannon, serving as the ultimate killer move. "You always have to go all out, even for a water gun fight."

Name: Inktrail
WorldDescription: Paint filled, color preset, trigger pressed, pixel dots of light leap from the brush's tip... The girl is more lively than ever today, spinning ceaselessly on the empty canvas known as the battlefield. She wields her blade as a brush, freely drawing her vision with every stroke.

Name: Prismatic Waves
WorldDescription: Schools of fish roam through the sea anemone's skirt and leave silver trails behind. The deep currents paint strips of flowing ribbons with the brilliant corals on the rocks. The blue is only the foundation of a majestic vastness of colors.

Name: Cobalt Soul
WorldDescription: Crafted from green beast bones, this daisho gleams with an eerie chill light, even in the abyss. For the seafarers, it's not just proof of their freedom from captivity; it's a reminder of the burdens they must bear.

Name: Stellar Thunder
WorldDescription: The daiso seems to contain the fury of lightning and stars, incomprehensible to common sense. Thunder roars when the daiso is wielded with enlightenment, and unsheathing them will produce a blue flame that can light up the night sky.

Name: Firescale
WorldDescription: Forged with secret tempering techniques, the blades of this Daisho feature wave-like patterns resembling a dancing dragon. The high-entropy alloy sheaths are said to store the wielder's excess energy and are always emanating a fiery glow. Holding these blades feels like climbing upon the scales of a dragon; even an army cannot stop them.

Name: Penance Flame
WorldDescription: A pair of steel swords with ghosts painted on their scabbards, thunderproof mekugi and tsukamaki, and blades inscribed with the killing intent: judge the enemy with the power of thunder but never get the soul deprived by them. The will of their wielder will be carried out through electric currents.

Name: Nocturnal Edge
WorldDescription: A cold blade slices through the moonlight. Wherever it passes becomes a battlefield, and the ring of steel lights up the night.

Name: Cyan Strings
WorldDescription: A master luthier was invited to make this Folding Fan for a dancer. Its razor-sharp edge radiates a chilling aura, while the flowing streams and blossoms on the surface make the fan look like an elegant piece of art rather than a deadly weapon. Is this contrast a reflection of the dancer's playful intent or the secret to its hidden lethality? The answer lies within her mischievous grin—have you guessed it?

Name: Bloom and Boom
WorldDescription: The power output of these claw blades has been adjusted for medical purposes. They can pick up a fragile flower or tear off unwanted bandages easily.

Name: Neverafter
WorldDescription: A souvenir from a paradise woven with innocence. Each swing carries the pure joy of a child and brings a smile to the wielder's face.

Name: Star Dragon Fist
WorldDescription: Inspired by traditional Kowloong armor, this powered gauntlet has adopted the latest denotation technology. It is highly flexible and can be used as a weapon or a prosthetic arm.

Name: Terminator Line
WorldDescription: Amidst the vast expanse of the sea, the young girl has witnessed countless sunrises and sunsets, accompanied by the serene glow of stars and the moon. Before these sights rarely seen in the present era, she embraces the silence that belongs only to her.

Name: Nostalgic Isolation
WorldDescription: Memories of the past bloom in her dreams amidst the ebb and flow of broken whispers. She would rather drown in the bygone wishes than open her eyes to touch the desolated reality. But if she reaches out her hand, she will find the light she once lost upon the sea is now shining upon her.

Name: Silken Piercer
WorldDescription: On the jade sea, a beauty dances, pointing her red Halberd Blade to the sky. Suddenly, she strikes, like a streak of lightning. Just like they said, it is a rare treasure that carries the mystery of heaven and earth.

Name: Rebellion Woe
WorldDescription: The ancient language, long forgotten, etched onto the blade, hums in the wanderer's hand. In this forgotten land, the steel blade hunting evil sends all it touches to its destined reincarnation.

Name: Flaming Snow
WorldDescription: Over the long course of time, everything has faded or decayed, except this dark longsword that she always carries with her. She does not need anyone to comfort or acknowledge her in this long and lonely journey. All she needs is the power in her hand to reassure her that she has made the right choice.

Name: Fallen Plumage
WorldDescription: Plumage falls on earth from the dancing bird. She draws the cold blade and wields it, depicting a picture of joys and sorrows with shadow and light. It starts softly but suddenly climaxes in the sound of drums and gongs. When the music stops, her singing still echoes and lingers on stage.

Name: Vermilion Clangs
WorldDescription: The Sparragon's Gibbous Edge sings like a phoenix, its vermilion blade thirsty for blood. According to the Kowloong Codex: Volume of Divine Arms: "The Sparragon's vermilion blade was forged from twin souls. If the brother falls, the blade shatters; when the sister awakens, triumph shall follow." Tempered by starlit flame, with dragon scales and sparrow feathers fused as one, this blade cleaves the old world and ushers in a new chapter with a single strike.

Name: Party Maker
WorldDescription: This pair of classic headphones is tuned according to the fundamentalist audio standard of the Golden Age. It has a wide sound stage and a crisp sound, with a clear high frequency and a rich low frequency. Sorry? You don't like how it sounds? Your nervous system must not be sensitive enough. Why don't you grab another screw-flavor electrolyte at the bar?

Name: Synthetic Waves
WorldDescription: The waterproof polymer ear cups keep the hacker's summer skill: Beats of 120BPM echo through the waves, yet the high-frequency sound waves from the electronic warfare modules could break the target's firewall. The waves and the rock music keep coming, making the wearer sigh with admiration, "This is true music!"

Name: Awakening Prunus
WorldDescription: It's the color of peach blossoms on the branches and the color of the peach in the girl's hands in the warm sunset.

Name: Frostdyed
WorldDescription: The girl sits on her throne, surrounded by shimmering moonlight. The lofty starlight shines upon two radiant figures. As time passes, the moon is no longer alone; a constellation of stars now accompanies her.

Name: Ocean Leap
WorldDescription: A boundless ocean falls from heaven. Schools of fish swim as if they were performing a ritual of ascendance. All rivers flow into the ocean of old dreams, circling in an eternal cycle. The ocean is deep, but the traces of water are clear. On the gentle touch of the girl with crystal-clear pupils, waves spread and all things sing in harmony.

Name: Dystopian Verdict
WorldDescription: Serpents on the forbidden tree. Harvest of exile and decay. Dance, for the great power that created the ring of stars has restored our place and helped us reclaim the lost paradise. Sing, for the fair judgment of the god of poetry above, for he has accomplished unprecedented work described in poems before our eyes.

Name: Neon Midway
WorldDescription: Let the neon lights turn the city upside down. Every rooftop and skyscraper becomes a stage for tonight's celebration. The maiden stops for a moment, her smile shining brighter than the lights that fill the night sky.

Name: Safety Pledge
WorldDescription: Gear calibration, circuit stability, alloy reinforcement... Every morning, this passionate girl meticulously fine-tunes her equipment. It's not just her safety net but a promise to herself—to stay in peak condition, always ready to lend a hand to those in need.

Name: Full Throttle
WorldDescription: The race car bursts through the wind, rushing into the pit stop. A specialized rotating arm perfectly aligns with the front of the car, deploying a shield to lift the vehicle. Amidst the swirling heat, the crew swaps out the tires for preheated ones and watches as the driver returns to the track, facing the wind. The entire process takes only 1.86s.

Name: Timeless Tune
WorldDescription: A breeze brushes the strings, lifting the dust of millennia. Words from ancient and modern times quietly bloom in the silence. The majestic music gently unfolds the stories of history.

Name: Lotus Melody
WorldDescription: A pipa with a lotus pond painted on the body and strings resembling a rose curtain. Flick the strings and the aroma will travel through the air and make one feel like resting by a lotus pond. But when the music stops, the soundwaves would turn anything into ashes. What a gentle killer!

Name: Wintersweet Flush
WorldDescription: The fiery figure of girl appears through the snow in the fragrance of spring plum blossoms, adding a feeling of spring to the clouds. In the season of flowers, the girl plunks the strings to capture this ethereal scenery during the change of seasons, leaving a touch of red on the silver land.

Name: Moonlit Autumn
WorldDescription: The wood of the instrument curves, its grain a meandering stream bathed in the radiance of a thousand moons. As fingers drift over its frost-cooled strings, the notes slice through shadowed clouds to reveal the sky's clear, silent heart. A mighty resonance swells—moon-forged tones that fall like dew, soaking the dusty world below and washing its cares away. The exile, hearing this clarity, feels a soul-deep pull toward the osmanthus shadows of home; the wanderer, bathed in its glow, finds solace in memories of jade towers and marble courts. Here, the pipa is more than an instrument; it is the full moon itself, a jade wheel hung in the vault of heaven. And with every plucked string, an autumnal longing is unveiled, luminous and profound.

Name: Obsidian Owl
WorldDescription: Forged by a master craftsman of Kowloong, both the immense power and the intricate design demonstrate the expertise required to create such a weapon. The quenched iron is light and agile, reducing darkness and potential perils into nothingness with each determined strike.

Name: Argent Requiem
WorldDescription: When the silver bullet pierces the skull, does the executioner feel a flicker of reluctance? Every bone nail seals shut a lingering dream that refuses to die. Roses bloom into epitaphs amid the gunfire, an elegy for noble enemies. Death is but time, rewritten once more.

Name: Resplendence
WorldDescription: A ceremonial sword with a luxury black gold scabbard and a bright solar corona ornament. The dark red color on the edge of the blade reflects the bravery on the old battlefield. And the chilling aura it gives keeps everyone in the ceremony in awe.

Name: Blossom Aflame
WorldDescription: I wish to love, to create, to chase away the freezing coldness haunting the planets, and planting the spring back at home with you in the days to come.

Name: Blade Skewer
WorldDescription: How much salt? Oh, a whole bottle! And pepper? "To taste"... What is "to taste"? Next, "brush it with cooking oil"... That's too slow. Guess I'll just pour it! D-Damn! It's on fire! Put it out! ...It's fine, Commandant. I managed to save the skewer. It's not charred this time. The fish is cooked and delicious. Just go ahead.

Name: Dusktide Ripples
WorldDescription: When the clamor of the world fades into the night, a ghostly blue luminescence emerges from the abyss. Flecks of phosphorescence shimmer across the boundless sea, captivating the gaze. The maiden wades through the water, leaving ripples in her wake. She reaches out slowly, and the cold glow licks at her fingertips, scattering like celestial dust—brief, radiant, and just bright enough to banish the dark sea's solitude.

Name: Aka Oni
WorldDescription: Flesh and steel intertwined, the charms shatter. Crimson arms clench, a howling gale erupts. It clings to the girl like a ravenous beast, a shadow ready to pounce on her foes, devouring evil spirits without mercy.

Name: Momotaro
WorldDescription: The golden day sleeps soundly, the streets flicker with lights. It's time for the hero to do her duty. With her heart-shaped partner, she leaps between skyscrapers, sending the bad guys who disturb the peace of the night back to their rabbit holes—don't laugh! This is a backstory I have been thinking about for a long time!

Name: Wild Hunt
WorldDescription: The sun was scorching. The land was burning. The wind was howling with yellow sand. Startrail fought the beast head-on with her incredible shield and axe. Ho! Ha! They fought like that for three days! And? And the bad guys were chased away. The sand storm stopped. And peace was restored. Thank you, Startrail!

Name: The All-Seeing Key
WorldDescription: A staff with the white wings of purity, the crown of stars, and the divine light. It shines, lighting up the spirit bay and stars. It's the key to happiness and enlightenment and the poem leading to paradise.

Name: Mistbound Mystique
WorldDescription: Only those who resonate with the wielder may witness the true form of this weapon.

Name: Everlight Oath
WorldDescription: When eternal night draws near, the Mistress of Fate lights an undying flame. She walks through the dark corridors, sealing the glories and secrets of the past within the endless night. Through the river of time she keeps her silent watch, her crown shining like stars that never fade. She waits, for the destined one who can read the meaning behind her faint smile before time itself comes to an end.

Name: Blatant Flamboyance
WorldDescription: In the mist, the soft glow of the street lights meets the shadow. In this mirage city, the boundaries of rationality are blurred. Self and instinct dance to a silent melody. It's getting loud. The party is about to start.

Name: Stygian Parasol
WorldDescription: A deadly dance in the Nagi forest stirs up the beasts of the night. The poisonous serpents gather in caves, beheld by the umbrella-wielder. With a flourish of the hand, the flowers scatter in a kaleidoscopic performance; with a lightning strike, the beast is felled. The beautiful garment hides under the open umbrella, leaving behind the mourns of a lost soul.

Name: Flawless Deception
WorldDescription: Beneath the shelter of its skeletal frame, a mirage of wealth and gilded dreams runs wild. She moves untouched between the revelry and the despair, her scornful eyes drinking in the grotesque theatre of human folly. The true grand deception—the theft from heaven itself—is measured not in profit or loss, but in the plunder of that foolish courage which springs from greed.

Name: Poet of Iris
WorldDescription: Wearing a crown of laurels, the god of wine composes phrases themed time. She sings, attributing her regrets and mistakes to tolerance and compassion through vibrations of the strings. As time passes, she walks through the thorns at night, expressing her feelings through a lonely song.

Name: Vernal Blessing
WorldDescription: If life were a song, you would be the melody I hum in profound silence. May we share every season to come with our heartstrings intertwined, and compose a symphony of wind and dancing petals.

Name: Whimsical Oracle
WorldDescription: In the name of the Anti-Idol Activity Tribunal—One, do not forget your devotion. Two, do not be stingy with microtransactions. Three, keep watching the videos. Four, look after your faithful fellows. Five, exercise your willpower and remain within your apartment's walls. Six, worship the holy convention halls. Seven, accept the blessings and love for all! Follow the chief commander's lead and await the final judgment with a hundred thousand likes!

Name: Seafoam Sparkler
WorldDescription: Within the smooth, streamlined barrel, a cool tension lurks in wait. A light tap of the finger, and a slender arc of water slices through the sun-woven peace, planting a glistening medal squarely upon someone's shoulder. The splashing droplets stir ripples in the lazy summer air—and so begins a game of joy, meant only for you and her.

Name: Crimson Dawn
WorldDescription: It is the flame core that pierces through the darkness and the light that outlines the dawn. Fate shall bless the embers and restore the order.

Name: Wrathvanquish
WorldDescription: Across the skies that stretch endlessly deep, wailing souls are severed by this lance without a trace. Legend tells that its forger once stood atop the mountain peak and pierced the ghost lord's lingering spirit with a single strike—even heaven and earth trembled at its might. Only those of unwavering will may wield this weapon.

Name: The Ordinance
WorldDescription: Though the world lies shattered, the ancient laws still endure, their rigor testing the boundaries of damnation. The crimson blade sweeps through the void, severing the worldly chains that have bound countless souls. The sinful return to nothingness, while those in agony find release. In this fallen realm, death is punishment, as well as redemption.

Name: Scissors of Fate
WorldDescription: Cut the thread of fate, and weave the wishes of future. But if you seek to mend it... first, show me the shape of the tear.

Name: Eternal Slumbering Sands
WorldDescription: Across the sea of sand, the lance stands like a stele from a forgotten age, shearing the veil between life and death. It conducts the soul-fires of the eternally exiled—those caught in futile struggle—into an absolute and final silence. Here, there are no hymns, no lamentations. Even death's last echo is swallowed by the inexorable sands, becoming mere sustenance for the void. As grit grinds on grit, all sound bleeds into stillness... This is the desert of death's most searing curse: to choose silence as the obliterating dunes consume you... or to become silence itself.

Name: Glimpsed Grace
WorldDescription: A maiden walks by the stream. Moonlight slips between her fingers as lotus petals drift with the wind, brushing against the water and breaking its reflection. In that fleeting instant, beauty flashes and fades like a dream.

Name: Floranum
WorldDescription: The blade itself is delicately glossy, gleaming even in pitch-black darkness.

Name: Hymn of Stars
WorldDescription: A Christmas elf is said to come with cheery tintinnabulations in snow, and at this time, snowflakes fly as if they are celebrating her arrival—Shh... You heard that? Here she is!
